title: Cobalt
technologies: React/Redux, form validation/control, RESTful Apis, DraftJS
description: The idea development platform! 1.Built the PROJECT CREATION experience, that offers the user a guided process to launch their new business idea. 2.Revamped the PROJECT DETAIL section. Pulled in saved user data and populated panels with proper project data. 3.Improved Navigation experience sitewide. Optimized sidenav: made it responsive and changed design. 4.Implemented an intuitive sidebar to PROJECT CREATE and EDIT, added a 'save and close' button option, and error alerts when necessary before project is published. 5.Implemented DraftJs to the app: allow the user to put rich text into the content they add, making sure we allow HTML to be saved to the DB, and rendered in PROJECT DETAILS. 6.Ensured new design matches general website graphic design.

title: Happy Cloud
description: Track your daily gratitude and reflect on past gratefulness. Enter your daily appreciation, generate your personalized word cloud and share it to spread the positivity!

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This app takes information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Get the current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast for any city you search for!

title: Budget Tracker
description: Track your budget - even while in the subway- this app allows you to add expenses and deposits to your budget whether you are online or offline.
